name: web-voice-recognizer
description: Web voice recognition sample by Web Speech API

scripts.rmdst-start: if [ -e dist ]; then rm -r dist; fi
scripts.rmdst-build: if [ -e extention/dist ]; then rm -r extention/dist; fi
scripts.build: npm run rmdst-build && parcel build src/index.html --no-optimize --no-source-maps --dist-dir extention/dist
